      • plus

        @NotNull
public BackoffBuilder.BaseBackoff plus(@NotNull
                                                Backoff backoff)
        Sums the specified backoff to this one.
        For each input count, if at least one of the returned delays is different than NO_DELAY, its value is returned. If both are different, the sum of the two values is returned.
        Parameters:
        backoff - the backoff to add.
        Returns:
        the summed backoff policy.

      • withJitter

        @NotNull
public BackoffBuilder.BaseBackoff withJitter(float percentage)
        Adds jitter to this backoff policy.
        Parameters:
        percentage - a floating number between 0 and 1 indicating the percentage of delay to randomize.
        Returns:
        the backoff policy with jitter.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the percentage is outside the [0, 1] range.
